content.text:
Let me help you construct this structure using the blocks from the dictionary.

Analysis of Target Image:
- Total Blocks: 7 blocks
- Colors: Orange (cylindrical and triangular blocks) and Yellow (rectangular blocks)
- Layers: 3 layers
- Structure: A central tall orange structure with yellow rectangular blocks intersecting and orange triangular blocks on top

Block Selection from Dictionary:
- Yellow Rectangular Blocks: Indices 1, 2, 3, 4
- Orange Cylindrical Blocks: Indices 6, 7, 8
- Orange Triangular Blocks: Indices 13, 14, 15, 16

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6 (vertical orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (yellow rectangular block)
    Step3: Move block with index 2 (yellow rectangular block, perpendicular to first yellow block)
    Step4: Move block with index 13 (orange triangular block)
    Step5: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular block)
    Step6: Move block with index 8 (horizontal orange cylinder)
    Step7: Move block with index 16 (orange triangular block at top)
}
